text: Valley Forge Flag, based in Wyomissing, Pennsylvania, is one of the largest U.S. flag manufacturers. The company was founded in 1882. It has a large wet printing facility in Olanta, South Carolina. In June 2015, following the events of the Charleston church shooting, Valley Forge Flag announced that they would cease to sell Confederate flags. == References == == External links == * Category:1882 establishments in Pennsylvania Category:Companies based in Berks County, Pennsylvania Category:Companies based in South Carolina Category:Companies established in 1882 Category:Flag manufacturers
